steps.name: Creating Inwarranty job with Create Job API
Setting up the BaseURI, Content Type as Application/JSON and attaching the SensitiveData filter for a role and attaching payload
Getting the value from the Config file
Getting the Auth token for the role

parameters.name: payload
parameters.value: CreateJobPayload[mst_service_location_id=1, mst_platform_id=2, mst_warrenty_status_id=1, mst_oem_id=1, customer=Customer[first_name=Zulminan, last_name=Ahmed, mobile_number=9876543210, mobile_number_alt=, email_id=ahmedzulminan@gmail.com, email_id_alt=], customer_address=CustomerAddress[flat_number=401, apartment_name=Orchid Apartment, street_name=Punjabi Gali, landmark=IndusInd Bank ATM , area=Okhla, pincode=110025, country=India, state=Delhi], customer_product=CustomerProduct[dop=2026-01-26T18:11:42.908260604Z, serial_number=86991365683924, imei1=86991365683924, imei2=86991365683924, popurl=2026-01-26T18:11:42.908401368Z, product_id=1, mst_model_id=1], problems=[Problems[id=1, remark=Battery Issue]]]

parameters.name: createJobPayload
parameters.value: CreateJobPayload[mst_service_location_id=1, mst_platform_id=2, mst_warrenty_status_id=1, mst_oem_id=1, customer=Customer[first_name=Zulminan, last_name=Ahmed, mobile_number=9876543210, mobile_number_alt=, email_id=ahmedzulminan@gmail.com, email_id_alt=], customer_address=CustomerAddress[flat_number=401, apartment_name=Orchid Apartment, street_name=Punjabi Gali, landmark=IndusInd Bank ATM , area=Okhla, pincode=110025, country=India, state=Delhi], customer_product=CustomerProduct[dop=2026-01-26T18:11:42.908260604Z, serial_number=86991365683924, imei1=86991365683924, imei2=86991365683924, popurl=2026-01-26T18:11:42.908401368Z, product_id=1, mst_model_id=1], problems=[Problems[id=1, remark=Battery Issue]]]

steps.name: Expecting the response to have Content type as Application/Json, Status code 200 and Response Time less than 1000 ms

labels.name: story
labels.value: FD should be able to create job
